@cometEmailId.title: The @cometEmailId schema
@cometEmailId.description: Soil Metrics API email address or Comet-Farm.com email address.

Cropland.title: The Cropland schema
Cropland.description: Cropland is equivalent to an individual field or parcel.

GEOM.title: The GEOM schema
GEOM.description: Geometry, point or polygon. Polygon has maximum about of vertices, 1000.  Max size is 10,000 acres. SRID any

Pre-1980.title: The Pre-1980 schema
examples: See COMET-Farm_API_File_Specification.xlsx Pre-1980 history by LRR tab.

Year1980-2000.title: The Year1980-2000 schema
examples: See COMET-Farm_API_File_Specification.xlsx 1980-2000 history by LRR tab.

PreCRPManagement.title: The PreCRPManagement schema
examples: Irrigated: Annual Crops with Hay/Pasture in Rotation

PreCRPTillage.title: The PreCRPTillage schema
PreCRPTillage.description: An explanation about the purpose of this instance.

PostCRPManagement.title: The PostCRPManagement schema
examples: Irrigated: Annual Crops with Hay/Pasture in Rotation

@CropNumber.title: The @CropNumber schema
@CropNumber.description: Crop number for this crop event. Can have up to 3 crops for one crop year

ContinueFromPreviousYear.title: The ContinueFromPreviousYear schema
ContinueFromPreviousYear.description: Was this crop planted in the previous year.

yield.title: The yield schema
yield.description: Yield amount. See crop type spec for yield units.

NApplicationAmount.title: The NApplicationAmount schema
NApplicationAmount.description: Nitrogen application amount. Units in lbs N/acre
